description: This table stores unconfirmed patient tracking information.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UNCONFRM_PAT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unconfirmed patient status category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Duplicate Review Needed


Identity Verification Needed


Patient Creation in Progress


Flagged as Suspicious

columns.name: UNCONFRM_PAT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unconfirmed patient workflow source category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


MyChart - On My Way


MyChart - Unverified Proxy Video Visit


Welcome


MyChart - Self-Signup


MyChart - Open Scheduling


MyChart - Symptom Checker


Unconfirmed Identity Activity


Web Service


MyChart - SAML Login


MyChart - Guest Proxy

columns.name: UNCONFRM_PAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unconfirmed patient status reason category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Fake Demographics


Identity Theft


No Identification


Patient Not Present


Patient Cannot Communicate


Other
